sentences.en: He has some acquaintance with German, but doesn't speak it fluently.
sentences.cn: 他略懂一点德语, 但说得不流利.

sentences.en: He heard about the job through a mutual acquaintance (=  someone you and another person both know  ) .
sentences.cn: 他是通过一个双方都认识的人知道有这份工作的。

sentences.en: Her manner seemed unpleasant at first, but she improved on further acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 起初她的举止让人很不愉快, 但是经过进一步接触她改了许多.

sentences.en: I am so pleased to make your acquaintance, Mr Tweed.
sentences.cn: 很高兴认识您，特威德先生。

sentences.en: I first made his acquaintance in the early 1960s.
sentences.cn: 我与他初次相识是在20世纪60年代早期。

sentences.en: I have never made his acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 我与他素昧平生.

sentences.en: I have only a bowing [ nodding ] acquaintance with him.
sentences.cn: 我和他只有点头之 交.

sentences.en: I regret to have made your acquaintance so late.
sentences.cn: 识荆恨晚.

sentences.en: I should be delighted to make Mrs McGough’s acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴能认识麦高夫太太。

sentences.en: It delights me to have made your acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴与你相识.

sentences.en: Lewis was my closest acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 路易斯是我最熟悉的人.

sentences.en: My uncle did not improve on further acquaintance (=  when you knew him better  ) .
sentences.cn: 深交之后我叔叔依然如故。

sentences.en: On first acquaintance she is cool and slightly distant.
sentences.cn: 初次相见时她表现冷淡并有点爱搭不理。

sentences.en: She was a casual acquaintance of my family in Vienna.
sentences.cn: 她是我们家在维也纳的一个交情不深的朋友。

sentences.en: The imposter sponged 1000 pounds from his acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 那个骗子从相识者那里骗取1000英镑.

sentences.en: The practice of a lawyer requires acquaintance with court procedures.
sentences.cn: 当律师要熟悉法庭程序。

sentences.en: They developed an acquaintance over the Internet.
sentences.cn: 他们在因特网上相识。

sentences.en: They have little acquaintance with colloquial English.
sentences.cn: 他们对英语会话几乎一窍不通.

sentences.en: This is how I struck up an acquaintance with her.
sentences.cn: 我就是这样和她结为朋友的.

sentences.en: We are the casual acquaintance of a long railway journey.
sentences.cn: 我们是在火车长途旅行中偶然结识的朋友.

sentences.en: When did you make the acquaintance of his brother?
sentences.cn: 你是什么时候认识他兄弟的?

sentences.en: You can’t judge her on such short acquaintance (=  when you have not known her long  ) .
sentences.cn: 认识这么短时间，你无法对她作出评价。

words.tran_cn: 熟识的；知晓的；有知识的
社会关系,友情,亲密程度

phrases.phrase: make the acquaintance of (或 make someone's acquain

phrases.tran_cn: 相识不深的人；不完整或肤浅的知识

trans.tran_cn: 认识的人，交情，了解，熟悉
trans.tran_en: someone you know, but who is not a close friend
